title: Sam's Club Set To Open In Madison Thursday
text: Sam's Club Set To Open In Madison Thursday By Business Wire | 08/03/15 - 02:46 PM EDT Reprint Sam's Club associates and managers will join with local residents and officials to open the company's newly relocated club at 257 Grandview Blvd. in Madison this Thursday, August 6 following a 10 a.m. grand opening ceremony. "We are so excited to begin operation at our beautiful new facility," said Club Manager David Speer. "Our new location is 11,000 square feet larger than previous, contains an expanded produce area and a newly-designed Health and Wellness Center, featuring a Sam's Club Hearing Aid Center. Our members are going to love it." New club gives $10,000 to local nonprofits The grand opening celebration will focus on the company's commitment to being a club of the community. Sam's Club associates selected several local nonprofit organizations to receive $10,000 in community giving grants. Grant award winners include: Liberty Park National Coalition of 100 Black Women, Central MS Special Olympics Madison Mississippi SIDS Alliance & Infant Safety "Giving back is a part of the Sam's Club tradition and our associates are excited to be able to help such worthy organizations," said Speer. "It's another reason to be proud to work at Sam's Club." Last year, Sam's Club and Walmart stores in Mississippi provided $14.9 million dollars in cash and in-kind donations to nonprofit organizations in the state. These donations represent community grants, food donations and associate volunteer efforts from stores, clubs and the Walmart Foundation. Grand opening ceremony features local officials, special events Madison Mayor Mary Hawkins Butler and members of Madison the City Chamber of Commerce will be among those in attendance at Thursday's grand opening ceremony. The Madison Police Department will post the colors and Sam's Club associate Tikesha Simmons will perform the national anthem. Sam's Club will also showcase a variety of food samples and product demonstrations. Special events include Vitamix Blenders, Chef Shamy Gourmet Butters, Logo Tailgate Event, and Polk's Meat to name a few. 1 of 3
